channel.title: 1 Error?
channel.description:
This is what my compiler says
[code] Gui.java:22: '{' expected public class Gui extends, client{ActionListener} ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What do i place in there?

item.title: 1 Error?
item.dc:creator: @thuqs_range2 thuqs range
item.description:
@thuqs_range2 wrote:

I’ved fixed it, thanks guys.

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Error?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“synchronized_, post:5, topic:401353”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=498413.msg3644873#msg3644873 date=1309301322]
You’re attempting to extend the class client and implement the interface ActionListener. (See link on inheritance at bottom of post).

Example:

class ThisClass extends SuperClass implements MyInterface

See:
http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/IandI/subclasses.html
[/quote]

this.

AND also, the many other things that are wrong with that one line.

First off, you have a comma after extends… Why? Remove it.
Secondly, you have brackets around ActionListener… Why? Remove them.
Thirdly, you need to add the implements keyword before ActionListener.[/quote]
I don’t think he understands what he’s doing in the slightest - hence just read Oracle’s explanation.

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Error?
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

[quote=“thuqs range, post:3, topic:401353”][quote author=† Kane † link=topic=498413.msg3644866#msg3644866 date=1309300981]
Definitely not a ‘{’ which obviously isn’t expected.
[/quote]

So what do i do, im confused.[/quote]

Listen to them, I was just trolling you.

Read full topic

Secondly, you have brackets around ActionListener… Why? Remove them.
